title: Aatrox is overpowered is Riot Games stupid?
body:
It will take 2 weeks to 6 months for Aatrox to be nerfed.

Who the hell does that much damage with his Q at level 1.
I can't even farm in the middle of the lane?
Wait a second so if Aatrox is picked, I have to farm under turret every time I am against Aatrox because I will be poked by his Q that knocks up 3 times.

Oh yeah only one of his Q is long range.
Don't forget his dash Q combo.

He is broken please nerf his Q damage and he will be okay.
